## Source: ossf-package-analysis (541a04f56cbd8f31800abc491c053fa5bb6d98930facf5e3cb0a31cbb84a01d6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'elf-stats-merry-cookiejar-987' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
